The foolish teaching of self and the cos: Someone has the view that the self and the cosmos are one and the same
They hear the Realized One or their disciple teaching Dhamma for the uprooting of all grounds, fixations, obsessions, insistences, and underlying tendencies regarding views
They think, ‘Whoa, I’m going to be annihilated and destroyed! I won’t exist any more!’
They sorrow and wail and lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion.
The correct view of self and the cosmos: Someone doesn't have the view that the self and the cosmos are one and the same
They hear the Realized One or their disciple teaching Dhamma for the uprooting of all grounds, fixations, obsessions, insistences, and underlying tendencies regarding views
It never occurs to them, ‘Whoa, I’m going to be annihilated and destroyed! I won’t exist any more!’
They don’t sorrow and wail and lament, beating their breast and falling into confusion.
The process of liberation [mn22:47.4]: Giving up transmigrating through births in future lives
Giving up the five lower fetters
The qualities of those who have faith an: They have a degree of faith and love for the Buddha
